thread.title: Sudan: Minister - Sudan to Import Modern Trains From China
thread.title_full: Sudan: Minister - Sudan to Import Modern Trains From China

title: Sudan: Minister - Sudan to Import Modern Trains From China
text:
South Sudan: Obama Pushes for End to South Sudan Conflict 
Khartoum — The Vice-President of the Republic, HassaboMohammed Abdulrahman met, Sunday, at his office, at the Republican Palace, the Minister of Transport, Roads and Bridges, Engineer, Makawi Mohammed Al-Awad who said in press statement following the meeting that he briefed Hassabo on the performance in udan Rail Ways Corporation (SRC) and the rehabilitation projects from Port Sudan to Sinnar. 
Engineer, Makawi said the current year will witnesssigning of contract of Al-Neil and Al-Sharg trains asstarting for the expansion in the rail way lines after the success of the experiment in the pat two years. 
The minister has said Sudan was able to surpass the the economic embargo by heading to China, indicating to arrangements for the signing of agreements for the import of modern trains from China during the coming period. Sudan 
The US President has appealed to East African regional leaders to strive to end the South Sudan conflict. He also … see more » Copyright © 2015 Sudan News Agency. All rights reserved.
